[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Addressable:           [0m[1;36m00[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Partially addressable: [0m[1;36m01[0m[39m [0m[1;36m02[0m[39m [0m[1;36m03[0m[39m [0m[1;36m04[0m[39m [0m[1;36m05[0m[39m [0m[1;36m06[0m[39m [0m[1;36m07[0m[39m [0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpeilgactv[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer crash was observed when running the libFuzzer-based test [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness against the Mongoose codebase. The fuzzer input triggered a [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow in the function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msource file `net_builtin.c`, line [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The overflow occurs on a one-byte read immediately past an allocated [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer. The stack trace shows the error propagating through `mg_tcpip_rx` into the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzing entry point `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - During fuzz testing, AddressSanitizer reports a heap-buffer-overflow in [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The invalid read is of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, exactly one byte [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbeyond a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The crash is reproducible by feeding the same test case to the fuzz target with[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Vulnerability Type[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Heap-buffer-overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[39mout-of-bounds read[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Observations and Findings[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. The fuzzer allocates a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer in `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` and passes [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mit, via `mg_tcpip_rx`, into `rx_icmp`.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. At `net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m`, `rx_icmp` reads one byte past the end of that [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. The sanitizer log clearly marks the redzone [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`fa` bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m immediately after the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated region, confirming the one-byte overflow.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. The call stack:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - rx_icmp → mg_tcpip_rx → LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput → fuzzer loop.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. No other errors or warnings precede the overflow in the log; the failure is [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdeterministic under the given input.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Code Areas for Investigation[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `net_builtin.c` around line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in the `rx_icmp` function: examine buffer [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mboundaries and any index or length calculations.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. The `mg_tcpip_rx` wrapper in the same file [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`net_builtin.c` around line [0m[1;36m897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto understand how packet data and length are propagated.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. The fuzzing harness in `test/fuzz.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m and [0m[1;36m106[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, where the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer is allocated and passed to the network code.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. ICMP packet parsing logic in `rx_icmp`, including any loops or pointer [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marithmetic that may not account for the actual buffer size.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInvestigating these components will provide a holistic view of how the overflow [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marises and which input validations or length checks might be missing.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m291[0m[39m:  uint8_t addopts = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m293[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mopts + [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m, &ip_req, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip_req[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m294[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_req_dns[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m opts[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m24[0m[39m + addopts++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m DNS[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m295[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_req_sntp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m opts[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m24[0m[39m + addopts++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;36m42[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m SNTP[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m296[0m[39m:  opts[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m21[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mopts[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m21[0m[1;39m][0m[39m + addopts[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m297[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mtx_dhcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m broadcast, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0xffffffff[0m[39m, opts,[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m298[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mopts[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + addopts - [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m299[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"DHCP req sent"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m300[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m301[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m302[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m RFC-[0m[1;36m2131[0m[39m #[0m[1;36m4.3[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, #[0m[1;36m4.4[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mrenewing: unicast, rebinding: bcast[0m[1;39m)[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m303[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mtx_dhcp_request_re[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, uint8_t *mac_dst,[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m304[0m[39m:                               uint32_t ip_src, uint32_t ip_dst[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m305[0m[39m:  uint8_t opts[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m306[0m[39m:      [0m[1;36m53[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Type: DHCP request[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m307[0m[39m:      [0m[1;36m255[0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m End of options[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m308[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m309[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mtx_dhcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, mac_dst, ip_src, ip_dst, opts, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mopts[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, true[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m310[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"DHCP req sent"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m311[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m312[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m313[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mtx_dhcp_discover[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m314[0m[39m:  uint8_t opts[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m315[0m[39m:      [0m[1;36m53[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m,     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Type: DHCP discover[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m316[0m[39m:      [0m[1;36m55[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Parameters: ip, mask[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;36m255[0m[39m           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m End of options[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mtx_dhcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m broadcast, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0xffffffff[0m[39m, opts, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mopts[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfalse[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"DHCP discover sent. Our MAC: %M"[0m[39m, mg_print_mac, ifp->mac[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:static struct mg_connection *[0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_mgr *mgr, struct pkt *pkt,[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:                                     bool lsn[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:  struct mg_connection *c = NULL;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc = mgr->conns; c != NULL; c = c->next[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->is_arplooking && pkt->arp &&[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m328[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmemcmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt->arp->spa, c->rem.ip, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->arp->spa[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m329[0m[39m:      break;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m330[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->is_udp && pkt->udp && c->loc.port == pkt->udp->dport[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m break;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Identify the root cause:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `rx_icmp`, the code unconditionally dereferences `pkt->icmp->type` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m before verifying that the incoming packet buffer actually contains a full ICMP[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzzer supplies only [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes of overall packet data; after stripping [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mEthernet [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m14[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and IPv4 header [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, only zero bytes of ICMP header [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremain. The single-byte read of `pkt->icmp->type` thus runs off the end of the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated buffer, triggering the one-byte heap-buffer-overflow.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Preserve existing behavior:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must continue to parse IPv4-based ICMP Echo [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtype [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m packets and generate [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreplies, including copying up to `space` bytes of payload into the response and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomputing checksums exactly as before.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes must be made to the fuzz harness, UDP, TCP, DHCP, or any other [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol logic.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Proposed patch points:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. In the IPv4 packet demultiplexer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe function `rx_ip`, which precedes the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` call[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, add a guard ensuring that the raw packet contains at least one [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP header:[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - After parsing IPv4 and before calling `rx_icmp`, verify `pkt->pay.len >= [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. If not, silently drop the packet [0m[1;39m([0m[39mno call to `rx_icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. For defense in depth, also add an entry check at the start of `rx_icmp`:[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Immediately after entering `rx_icmp` and before reading `pkt->icmp->type`, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcheck that `pkt->pay.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. If this fails, return without [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessing.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This two-stage check ensures that even if future code paths invoke `rx_icmp` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merroneously, the function will never read past the payload buffer.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Implementation steps:[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Locate the `rx_ip` function [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `net_builtin.c` around line [0m[1;36m330[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Find the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode path where it identifies `ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and sets up `pkt->icmp` and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay`, then unconditionally calls `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Immediately before that call, insert:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Not enough data for ICMP header, drop packet. *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          return;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Open `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m382[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m396[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and add at its very top:[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          return;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Retain the existing computation of `hlen`, clamping of `plen`, response [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuilding, and checksum calculation; no further changes to `rx_icmp` logic are [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mneeded.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. Rebuild and rerun AddressSanitizer+libFuzzer to confirm that the one-byte [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow no longer occurs and that legitimate ICMP Echo‐Reply traffic is still [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandled correctly.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Justification:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensuring `pkt->pay.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` directly prevents all [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout‐of‐bounds reads in ICMP parsing.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Downstream code already safeguards the response buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`space`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and clamps [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`plen`, so adding input‐length validation fully addresses the overflow without [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maltering reply semantics.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Placing checks both in the demuxer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and in `rx_icmp` offers [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mredundancy and guards against future code changes or alternative callers.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No other protocols or utilities are affected, tests will continue to pass, and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe fuzz harness remains intact.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Potential side effects:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Packets smaller than a full ICMP header will be silently dropped; this matches[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtypical network stack behavior [0m[1;39m([0m[39myou cannot parse ICMP without the full header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No existing functionality is removed; Echo [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtype [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m messages that include a [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfull header and any payload will still trigger replies.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Verify with integration tests that no legitimate small‐ICMP use cases [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mzero-length payload pings[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are inadvertently blocked: even for zero-length payload,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is required, which is correct.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. Reference:[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar payload‐length guards exist in other protocol handlers [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., before [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccessing UDP [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->udp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or DHCP headers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Align the ICMP guard with these [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting patterns for consistency.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpeilgactv[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a heap-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer in the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when running the libFuzzer harness. The [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow occurs during a read of a single byte just past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion allocated for the packet payload.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch attempt was made that adds checks on `pkt->pay.len` before setting [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp` and before invoking `rx_icmp`, and also guards the start of `rx_icmp` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith a similar length check. After applying this patch and rerunning the fuzz test,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same buffer-overflow error remains in `rx_icmp` at the same location.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - While fuzzing the `mongoose` TCP/IP stack, AddressSanitizer reports a [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow at  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m` in function `rx_icmp`.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow is a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, which lies [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimmediately past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Call stack snapshot:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `mg_tcpip_rx`  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     …  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer originates from a `malloc` in the fuzz harness [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which populates `pkt->pay.buf` and `pkt->pay.len` from [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe fuzzer input.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No other speculative root causes are noted in the initial report.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `net_builtin.c`, just before ARP handling, a new `case [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: [0m[35m/[0m[39m* ICMP *[0m[35m/[0m[39m` block[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwas added under the packet-type switch. Inside it:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Check if `pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`; if so, `break;`.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Assign `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;`  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Call `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` and then `break;`.  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the definition of `rx_icmp`, a duplicate guard was introduced:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The unchanged remainder of `rx_icmp` proceeds to read fields from `pkt->icmp`.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch result  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After recompiling with the patch, the fuzz run still aborts on the same [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow at  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m` in `rx_icmp`.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The error log shows exactly the same address, allocation context, and call [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack as before.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The new length checks did not prevent the out-of-bounds read.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for further investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The packet-dispatch logic in `mg_tcpip_rx`: confirm that the `case [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m:` block [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis reached under all ICMP paths and that no fallback path still calls `rx_icmp` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munguarded.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The structure and initialization of `pkt->pay.len` and `pkt->pay.buf` in the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz harness and in the code that wraps or copies the incoming buffer.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The layout and size of `struct icmp` versus the actual data in `pkt->pay.buf`:[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensure that payload length checks align with header plus payload accesses.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any pointer arithmetic in `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., reading options or extended fields[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat may exceed the initial header size.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Upstream callers in `mg_tcpip_rx` for handling of non-ICMP packet types that [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmight inadvertently reach the ICMP handler.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The ICMP handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m reads one extra byte past `pkt->pay.buf + [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->pay.len`. The existing length guard [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtoo weak. It only protects against missing the fixed [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte ICMP header, but does [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot account for the additional byte access within `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., reading optional[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfields, computing checksum, or accessing `pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mhlen[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Investigation of `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:360[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m420[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m shows that after [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mverifying `pkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mecho request[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, it computes a total header length [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`hlen`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that includes Ethernet + IP + ICMP header sizes, then copies `hlen` bytes [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor the reply. During checksum or copying, it reads one extra byte from [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.buf + hlen` [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., computing padding or accessing the next byte[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtriggering the off-by-one overflow when `pkt->pay.len == [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Additionally, the code that populates `pkt->pay.len` in `mg_tcpip_rx` relies [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mon the network-order IP total-length field [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`ip->len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m without proper `ntohs` [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconversion, which can inflate `pkt->pay.len` beyond the actual buffer length or [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmismatch the offset checks.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Strategy to Fix[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Strengthen the length guard in `rx_icmp`:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Change the guard to ensure there is at least `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes of payload before proceeding. This prevents any single-byte read at [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.buf + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - If `rx_icmp` needs more bytes for checksum or optional fields [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpadding, IP options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, raise the threshold accordingly [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `>= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + checksum_size`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Audit and correct IP total-length conversion:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - In `mg_tcpip_rx`, when computing `pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;35mntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mip_header_length`, ensure that `ntohs` is used exactly once and that `pkt->pay.len`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnever exceeds the allocated frame length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.len - eth_header_len - [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mip_header_len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Add a sanitizer check: truncate `pkt->pay.len` to `pkt->raw.len - [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39meth_header_len - ip_header_len` to guard against malformed IP lengths in fuzzer [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdata.[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Preserve existing functionality:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Maintain the case dispatch in `mg_tcpip_rx` for ICMP, leaving ARP and other[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocols untouched.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Retain the conversion and copying logic that builds echo responses.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Implementation Steps[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. In `net_builtin.c`, locate `static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - Replace[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           with[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Ensure at least ICMP header plus [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m byte for safe reads *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[1;39m([0m[39mAdjust “+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m” if deeper reads or checksum loops require more bytes.[0m[1;39m)[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. In the IP parsing section of `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround where `pkt->pay.len` is[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - Ensure you call `[0m[1;35mntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` exactly once:[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           uint16_t total_len = [0m[1;35mntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           size_t ip_hdr_len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver_ihl & [0m[1;36m0x0f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           size_t max_pay = raw_len - eth_hdr_len - ip_hdr_len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtotal_len < ip_hdr_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m [0m[1;35mdrop_packet[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[1;39m}[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             size_t pay_len = total_len - ip_hdr_len;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Never exceed actual buffer *[0m[35m/[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpay_len <= max_pay ? pay_len : max_pay[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Add unit tests or extend the existing fuzz harness with inputs that:[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - Set IP total-length < header length, to test drop path.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - Set IP total-length exactly = header length + N, to test truncated [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         - Set IP total-length > actual buffer length, to test truncation logic.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   e. No changes to the fuzz harness, no broad exception catches, no removal of [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfeatures.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Strengthening the length check in `rx_icmp` directly addresses the single-byte[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow at the boundary of `pkt->pay.len`.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Correcting IP length conversion prevents a malformed or out-of-order `ip->len`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom creating inconsistent `pkt->pay.len`, which underlies many TCP/IP parsing [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbugs.[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Truncating `pkt->pay.len` to the actual frame length is a standard defensive [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmeasure against malicious or malformed headers, used elsewhere in the codebase [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g., in UDP and TCP parsing routines[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This patch preserves all existing dispatch logic, echo-reply functionality, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand does not modify harness or external libraries.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Echo-reply packets with zero-length or minimal payload may now be dropped; [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis matches kernel behavior. If users expect zero-byte ICMP echo request handling,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconsider lowering the `+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` guard to exactly the bytes needed [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., just the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecksum loop requires [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but only after auditing the exact accesses in [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp`.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The IP-length truncation may hide certain malformed‐packet behaviors; [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthoroughly test ARP, UDP, and TCP codepaths to ensure no regressions.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Add logging for dropped ICMP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`MG_DEBUG`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, to ease debugging and [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuture maintenance.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWith these changes, the AddressSanitizer-reported heap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwill be resolved, and the code will safely handle both valid and malformed ICMP [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpackets without overruns. [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[01/02/26 06:53:28][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=307824;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=225028;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m[01/02/26 06:59:23][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Patching[1m)[0m Took [1;36m6.33[0m seconds; [33mexception[0m=[3;91mFalse[0m   ]8;id=399559;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=195696;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#23\[2m23[0m]8;;\

[2;36m[01/02/26 06:59:27][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Checking build[1m)[0m Took [1;36m3.99[0m seconds;             ]8;id=134933;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=474331;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#23\[2m23[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [33mexception[0m=[3;91mFalse[0m                                                               [2m                      [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.arp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, MG_TCPIP_EV_ARP, &pkt.raw[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_arp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x86dd[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt.ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA libFuzzer run against the `mongoose` codebase triggered an AddressSanitizer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow in the function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The fuzzer [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minput caused a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read just past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation in the ICMP payload.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was attempted that [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m early-returns from `rx_icmp` when the payload is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msmaller than `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` and [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m restructures the ARP/IPv4 dispatch [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mblock to clamp payload lengths safely. However, after applying this patch the same [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow at the same location in `rx_icmp` is still reproducible.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- During fuzz testing [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`run_fuzzer fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, AddressSanitizer reports a [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow is a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, exactly one byte past [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Call stack:  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mLLVMFuzzerTestOneInput[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. LibFuzzer harness entries  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The bug is reproducible in interactive mode with the same input, indicating it is[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot a one-off.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `net_builtin.c`, within `rx_icmp`:  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Ensure at least ICMP header plus one byte for safe reads *[0m[35m/[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    return;[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the Ethernet dispatch block for IPv4/ARP [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x806[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe patch replaces a simple length check and ARP call with:  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Calculation of IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`ip_hlen`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m from `ver_ihl`.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Extraction of `total_len` via `[0m[1;35mntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and validation against [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`ip_hlen`.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Clamping of `pay_len` to the actual buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.len - eth_hdr_len - [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mip_hlen`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Adjustment of `pkt->pay.buf` and `pkt->pay.len`.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - A switch over `pkt->ip->proto` instead of a direct ARP call.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mResult After Patch  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A second fuzz run triggers the identical AddressSanitizer report:  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Same location [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, same [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte overflow.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The early-return on small payloads did not prevent the invalid read.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The logic in `rx_icmp` around `pkt->pay.buf` [0m[35m/[0m[39m `pkt->pay.len` may not cover all [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing paths or header variants.  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Computation of payload offsets: how `pkt->icmp` and `pkt->pay` are set up when [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing raw packets.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The interaction between IPv4, ICMP, and other protocols in [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx`—particularly, whether malformed or truncated packets bypass the new [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mguard.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Validation of IP header fields [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`len`, `ver_ihl`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and their consistency with the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mactual buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overall packet-dispatch logic in `net_builtin.c` to ensure every path checks [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer bounds before dereferencing protocol headers.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
