[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m895[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m396[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Revert the erroneous ARP‐block restructuring and restore the original ARP [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The prior patch accidentally replaced the EtherType [0m[1;36m0x806[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mARP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m block with [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4‐style clamping using `pkt->ip`. This is incorrect—the ARP block must continue [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto treat ARP packets only.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Restore this section to:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x806[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       pkt.arp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct arp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.arp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, MG_TCPIP_EV_ARP, &pkt.raw[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mrx_arp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This ensures no unintended side effects on ARP processing and keeps the ARP [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpath safe.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Harden the IPv4 dispatch path to prevent malformed‐IHL exploitation  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the IPv4 block [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, replace the dual‐path [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mkpay` logic with a single, IHL‐driven sequence:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a. Read the IHL field:  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```c[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        uint8_t ihl = pkt.ip->ver_ihl & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b. Reject impossible IHLs [0m[1;39m([0m[39m<[0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and truncated headers:  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```c[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        size_t eth_hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        size_t ip_hlen  = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m ||[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            pkt.raw.len < eth_hlen + ip_hlen ||[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            [0m[1;35mntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          return;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     c. Truncate `pkt.raw.len` to the wire‐declared IP total length plus Ethernet [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader:  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```c[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        size_t total = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + eth_hlen;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len > total[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt.raw.len = total;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     d. Call `mkpay` exactly once, at the end of the IP header:  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```c[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     e. Proceed with `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, MG_TCPIP_EV_IP, &pkt.raw[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m&pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This guarantees that `pkt.pay.buf` and `pkt.pay.len` always refer to bytes [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwholly within `pkt.raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m..pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and prevents an attacker from setting [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`ver_ihl` to a large value that would make `mkpay` point outside of the allocated [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Strengthen `rx_icmp` to bounds‐check the ICMP header before dereferencing  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - At the very top of `rx_icmp`, before reading `pkt->icmp->type`, insert a [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mraw‐buffer‐based check:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Determine dynamic header lengths[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t eth_hlen  = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     uint8_t ihl      = pkt->ip->ver_ihl & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t ip_hlen   = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m ? [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m : [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t icmp_hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Ensure the entire ICMP header is present in the original packet buffer[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip == NULL ||[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m ||[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt->raw.len < eth_hlen + ip_hlen + icmp_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       return;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Now safe to read pkt->icmp->type[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Recompute hlen using the correct, dynamic IP header length[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t hlen  = eth_hlen + ip_hlen + icmp_hlen;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t plen  = pkt->pay.len;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[33m...[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mrest of ICMP echo‐reply logic unchanged[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Key points:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     * Verify `ihl >= [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m` so that `ip_hlen` makes sense.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     * Check `pkt.raw.len` against `eth_hlen + ip_hlen + icmp_hlen` to prevent the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout‐of‐bounds read at `pkt->icmp->type`.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     * Update `hlen` to use the dynamic `ip_hlen` [0m[1;39m([0m[39minstead of a hardcoded [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for correct payload‐space calculation when options are [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpresent.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Preserve existing functionality and fuzz harness unchanged  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All other code paths [0m[1;39m([0m[39mTCP, UDP, IPv6, DHCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remain untouched.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes to the fuzzing harness or public APIs.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Existing tests for ARP and ICMP functionality will continue to pass, as ARP [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlogic is restored to its original safe form and ICMP echo/reply behavior is [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreserved except for guarding against truncated inputs.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mJustification  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The crash occurs one byte past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte allocation when `pkt->icmp->type` is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread but the ICMP header is not fully in bounds. By validating the complete ICMP [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader against `pkt.raw.len` before dereferencing, we eliminate that [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap‐buffer‐overflow.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Malformed `ver_ihl` fields can still trick mkpay into producing out‐of‐bounds [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload pointers; by centralizing IHL validation in the IPv4 dispatch, mkpay is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malways called with a safe pointer and length.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Reverting the ARP block fix ensures we do not introduce new logic errors in ARP [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandling.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This strategy confines changes to `src/net_builtin.c`, does not touch the harness[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor external libraries, and preserves all existing code structure and tests.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Similar IHL‐based checks are already performed in mature IP stacks [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., Linux’s[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`ip_rcv`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so this approach aligns with established best practices for IP packet [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[01/02/26 06:59:38][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=859162;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=128025;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mShadow bytes around the buggy address:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m0x503ffffffe80[0m[39m: [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m[39m [0m[1;36m00[0m                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpeilgactv[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer-detected heap-buffer-overflow in the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when running the libFuzzer harness. The [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow occurs on a one-byte read just past an allocated [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte buffer. A patch [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwas attempted that:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Adds early returns if `pkt->ip` is NULL  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Extracts and validates IPv4 version and IHL fields  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Computes precise Ethernet, IP and ICMP header lengths  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Checks `pkt->raw.len` against the sum of header lengths before proceeding  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Reorders some checks in the ARP and IPv4 dispatch branches  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Clamps frame lengths to the IP total length  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mDespite these additions, the same heap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp` is still [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtriggered under fuzzing.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The fuzzer invokes `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, which allocates a buffer of [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand feeds it into the network parsing pipeline via `mg_tcpip_rx`.  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• In `rx_icmp`, the code inspects `pkt->icmp->type` and then proceeds to calculate [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`hlen` and `plen` without verifying that the buffer actually contains a full ICMP [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader and payload.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read overflow at offset [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexactly one byte [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpast the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m while reading `pkt->icmp->type`.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mKey observations  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The buffer is allocated by the fuzzing harness and never checked for minimum [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength before accessing `pkt->icmp`.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The flawed read is in the very first `if` condition inside `rx_icmp`.  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Downstream code assumes presence of full headers and payload based solely on [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`ifp->tx.len` and `pkt->pay.len`, not `pkt->raw.len`.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Introduced variables  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `eth_hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Parsed `ver` and `ihl` from `pkt->ip->ver_ihl`  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Calculated `ip_hlen = ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`, `icmp_hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Added precondition checks  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return`  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mver != [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m || ihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return`  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len < eth_hlen + ip_hlen + icmp_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return`  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Recomputed `hlen` and `space` using the new header sizes  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. In ARP and IPv4 branches, replaced comparisons like  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.arp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > pkt.raw.len`  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   with  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     `pkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.arp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   and analogously tightened IPv4 header checks.  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Applying the patch and rerunning the fuzzer produced the same AddressSanitizer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreport at `rx_icmp` line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The overflow remains on the very first byte read of the ICMP header.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• No new failure location is introduced; the initial overflow guard is still [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minsufficient.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for further investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The interplay among the following fields in struct pkt: `raw.len`, `pay.len`, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`ip`, `icmp`, and how they are initialized in `mg_tcpip_rx`.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• How and when `pkt->pay` is set [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvia `mkpay`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m relative to ICMP processing. Ensure [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay` is never used when `raw.len` is too small.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The semantics of `ifp->tx.len` versus `pkt->raw.len`—the code mixes these lengths[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen slicing payload.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• The parsing sequence of net_builtin.c: ensure that every pointer dereference of [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp`, `pkt->ip`, and `pkt->arp` is guarded by a length check on [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.len`.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m• Other protocol handlers in this file [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., IPv6 in `rx_ip6`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for similar [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmissing-length checks.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -f [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ export [0m[33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m[39m=[0m[35minteractive[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m[39m=[0m[35minteractive[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ export [0m[33mFUZZING_ENGINE[0m[39m=[0m[35mlibfuzzer[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZING_ENGINE[0m[39m=[0m[35mlibfuzzer[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ export [0m[33mSKIP_SEED_CORPUS[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m1[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mSKIP_SEED_CORPUS[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m1[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ run_fuzzer fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m655[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn == MG_IO_ERR[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m656[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"TLS recv error"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m657[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m658[0m[39m:      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Decrypted successfully - trigger MG_EV_READ[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m659[0m[39m:      io->len += [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m n;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m660[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, MG_EV_READ, &n[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m661[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m else n < [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m: outstanding data to be moved to c->recv[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m662[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m663[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m664[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m665[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mread_conn[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_connection *c, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m666[0m[39m:  struct connstate *s = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct connstate *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m667[0m[39m:  struct mg_iobuf *io = c->is_tls ? &c->rtls : &c->recv;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m668[0m[39m:  uint32_t seq = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m669[0m[39m:  uint32_t rem_ip;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m670[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&rem_ip, c->rem.ip, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m671[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->flags & TH_FIN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m672[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If we initiated the closure, we reply with ACK upon receiving FIN[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m673[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If we didn't initiate it, we reply with FIN as part of the normal TCP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m674[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m closure process[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m675[0m[39m:    uint8_t flags = TH_ACK;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m676[0m[39m:    s->ack = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m677[0m[39m:    s->fin_rcvd = true;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m678[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->is_draining && s->ttype == MIP_TTYPE_FIN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m679[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->seq == [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Simultaneous closure ?[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m680[0m[39m:        s->seq++;                               [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Yes. Increment our SEQ[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m681[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m                                  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Otherwise,[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m682[0m[39m:        s->seq = [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;       [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set to peer's ACK[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m683[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m684[0m[39m:      s->twclosure = true;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m685[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m686[0m[39m:      flags |= TH_FIN;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m687[0m[39m:      c->is_draining = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m688[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35msettmout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, MIP_TTYPE_FIN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m689[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m690[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mtx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->mgr->ifp, s->mac, rem_ip, flags, c->loc.port, c->rem.port,[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m691[0m[39m:           [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[32m""[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m692[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m this is an ACK[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m693[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->fin_rcvd && s->ttype == MIP_TTYPE_FIN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m s->twclosure = true;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m694[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mseq != s->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m695[0m[39m:    uint32_t ack = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m696[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ack == ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m697[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ignoring duplicate pkt"[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m698[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m699[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"SEQ != ACK: %x %x %x"[0m[39m, seq, s->ack, ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m700[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mtx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->mgr->ifp, s->mac, rem_ip, TH_ACK, c->loc.port, c->rem.port,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m701[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[32m""[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m702[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m703[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mio->size - io->len < pkt->pay.len &&[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m704[0m[39m:             ![0m[1;35mmg_iobuf_resize[0m[1;39m([0m[39mio, io->len + pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m705[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"oom"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m706[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m707[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy TCP payload into the IO buffer. If the connection is plain text,[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m708[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m we copy to c->recv. If the connection is TLS, this data is encrypted,[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m709[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m therefore we copy that encrypted data to the c->rtls iobuffer instead,[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m710[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m and then call [0m[1;35mmg_tls_recv[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to decrypt it. NOTE: [0m[1;35mmg_tls_recv[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m will[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m711[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m call back [0m[1;35mmg_io_recv[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m which grabs raw data from c->rtls[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m712[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&io->buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mio->len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m713[0m[39m:    io->len += pkt->pay.len;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m714[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m715[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"%lu SEQ %x -> %x"[0m[39m, c->id, [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, s->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m716[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Advance ACK counter[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m717[0m[39m:    s->ack = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m718[0m[39m:    s->unacked += pkt->pay.len;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m719[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m size_t diff = s->acked <= s->ack ? s->ack - s->acked : s->ack;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m720[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->unacked > MIP_TCP_WIN [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m && s->acked != s->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m721[0m[39m:      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Send ACK immediately[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m722[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"%lu imm ACK %lu"[0m[39m, c->id, s->acked[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m723[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mtx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->mgr->ifp, s->mac, rem_ip, TH_ACK, c->loc.port, c->rem.port,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m724[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->seq[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mmg_htonl[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, NULL, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m725[0m[39m:      s->unacked = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m726[0m[39m:      s->acked = s->ack;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m727[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ttype != MIP_TTYPE_KEEPALIVE[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msettmout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, MIP_TTYPE_KEEPALIVE[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m728[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m729[0m[39m:      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m if not already running, setup a timer to send an ACK later[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m730[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39ms->ttype != MIP_TTYPE_ACK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35msettmout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, MIP_TTYPE_ACK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m731[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m732[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m733[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->is_tls && c->is_tls_hs[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m734[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_tls_handshake[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m735[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc->is_tls[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m736[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mhandle_tls_recv[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m737[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m738[0m[39m:      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Plain text connection, data is already in c->recv, trigger MG_EV_READ[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m739[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, MG_EV_READ, &pkt->pay.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m740[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m741[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m742[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m743[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m744[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_tcp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
