[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m816[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_client[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m817[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->enable_dhcp_server && pkt->udp->dport == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m67[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m818[0m[39m:      pkt->dhcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct dhcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m819[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->dhcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m820[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_server[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m821[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m822[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mrx_udp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m823[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m824[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m825[0m[39m:    pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m826[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m827[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->tcp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m828[0m[39m:    uint16_t iplen = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m829[0m[39m:    uint16_t off = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->tcp->off >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * 4U[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m830[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen >= off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39miplen - off[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:794[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m806[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m794[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m795[0m[39m:  uint16_t frag = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->frag[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:838[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m846[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m838[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m839[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"IP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m840[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m || pkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m58[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m841[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m842[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m843[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m844[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m845[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m846[0m[39m:    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Overview and Root Cause  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   The heap‐buffer‐overflow occurs because `pkt->icmp` is set to point at `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset `eth_hlen + ip_hlen`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m before the code ever verifies that [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.len` covers the full ICMP header. The existing check in `rx_ip` [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m uses payload length—which is derived as [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`raw.len - ip_hlen`—and therefore allows buffers exactly equal to `eth_hlen + [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mip_hlen` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m=[0m[1;36m14[0m[39m+[0m[1;36m20[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to slip through without guaranteeing that the ICMP [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is in‐bounds. Only once inside `rx_icmp` does the patched guard [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfire, but by then the one‐byte read of `pkt->icmp->type` has already been executed [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munder the old code path.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Targets  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. The IPv4 dispatcher in `rx_ip` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines ~[0m[1;36m794[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m806[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: ensure pointer arithmetic [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto the raw buffer is safe before assigning `pkt->icmp`.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. The `rx_icmp` handler: keep its existing raw‐length guard, but verify the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mguard executes before *any* dereference of `pkt->icmp`.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed Steps  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. In `rx_ip` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIPv4 branch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, replace the current sequence  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   with a guard that mirrors the IPv6 path and protects the pointer setup:  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t eth_hlen   = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     uint8_t ver       = pkt->ip->ver_ihl >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     uint8_t ihl       = pkt->ip->ver_ihl & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m;  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t ip_hlen    = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t icmp_hlen  = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Do not dereference pkt->ip beyond basic header *[0m[35m/[0m[39m  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mver != [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m || ihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Ensure raw covers Ethernet + full IP header + ICMP header *[0m[35m/[0m[39m  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len < eth_hlen + ip_hlen + icmp_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Safe: now assign and set payload *[0m[35m/[0m[39m  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. In `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines ~[0m[1;36m381[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m396[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, ensure the first read of `pkt->icmp->type` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs strictly *after* a raw-length guard:  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t eth_hlen   = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       uint8_t ver       = pkt->ip->ver_ihl >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       uint8_t ihl       = pkt->ip->ver_ihl & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m;  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t ip_hlen    = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t icmp_hlen  = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Strict OOB guard before dereferencing pkt->icmp *[0m[35m/[0m[39m  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mver != [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m || ihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->raw.len < eth_hlen + ip_hlen + icmp_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Safe to read type now *[0m[35m/[0m[39m  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* proceed with echo reply logic *[0m[35m/[0m[39m  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Preservation of Existing Logic  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – The minimal size for a valid ICMP echo request [0m[1;39m([0m[39mEthernet 14B + IPv4 20B + ICMP[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m8B = 42B[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is preserved: a [0m[1;36m42[0m[39m‐byte packet passes the new guard.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – The version/IHL checks prevent malformed IP versions or IHL values.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Existing total‐length clamping and payload‐slicing in `mg_tcpip_rx` and [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_ip6` remain intact.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – The `mkpay` sequence and the semantics of `pkt->pay.len` are unchanged [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdownstream.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects and Mitigation  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – ICMP packets smaller than [0m[1;36m42[0m[39m bytes will be dropped earlier; this correctly [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdiscards protocols that can’t possibly carry a valid ICMP header.  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – No changes to external harness or test code; all existing tests and fuzz [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mentrypoints remain valid.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – The IPv4 option path [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is correctly handled by computing `ip_hlen = [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Additional Recommendations  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – For uniform safety, apply the same `raw.len` guard pattern to other IP [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocols in `rx_ip` [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., UDP, TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m before pointer setups, mirroring the IPv6 [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler’s approach.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Audit other dispatch branches [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_arp`, `rx_ip6`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to ensure they all [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mperform raw-length checks prior to dereferencing protocol headers.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   – Consider centralizing header‐length checks into a small helper to reduce code [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mduplication.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle IPv4 [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    else[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    pkt.ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    size_t eth_hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < eth_hlen + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    uint8_t ver = pkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    uint8_t ihl = pkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mver != [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m || ihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IPv4 or invalid IHL[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    size_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < eth_hlen + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated by options[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    uint16_t total_len = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtotal_len < ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m IP total length smaller than header[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    size_t total = eth_hlen + [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mtotal_len;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len > total[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt.raw.len = total;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Clamp to wire length[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, MG_TCPIP_EV_IP, &pkt.raw[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Unknown eth type %x"[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpeilgactv[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a heap-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer in the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `rx_icmp` within `src/net_builtin.c`. A malformed or truncated ICMP packet[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcauses a one-byte read beyond the allocated buffer when accessing [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type`.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was attempted to add explicit bounds checks and header‐length validations [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat several points:  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `rx_icmp`, verify Ethernet, IPv4 version/IHL, and raw length before computing [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffsets.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the IP dispatch block [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, similarly validate IHL and raw [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength before assigning `pkt->icmp`.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the Ethernet-IPv4 handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, clamp the raw [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mframe length, check version/IHL, total length, and apply `mkpay` only after [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidating header sizes.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying this patch, repeated fuzzing still triggers the same [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow at the same line in `rx_icmp`. The sanitizer log mirrors the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moriginal error, indicating the overflow check in `rx_icmp` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m was not [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfully prevented by the added guards.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzzer invokes `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, which calls `mg_tcpip_rx`, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mleading to `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `rx_icmp`, the code unconditionally reads `pkt->icmp->type` and then [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomputes header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, without [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mverifying that the underlying buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is large enough.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte heap-buffer-overflow at the byte immediately[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfollowing a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe region `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m150[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, meaning the code[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread one byte past the end of the allocated chunk.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow occurs on the line marked by `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Observations in the Initial Log  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The allocation of the packet buffer comes from `malloc` in the fuzz harness [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39min `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `rx_icmp` is called only for ICMP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIPv4 protocol [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The stack trace consistently shows the overflow at `rx_icmp` line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Attempt Overview  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `rx_icmp`:  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Early return if `pkt->ip` is NULL.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Extract IPv4 version and IHL from `pkt->ip->ver`, require [0m[33mversion[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m and [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIHL≥[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Calculate `eth_hlen`, `ip_hlen = ihl*[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`, `icmp_hlen`, then check [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.len >= eth_hlen + ip_hlen + icmp_hlen`.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Inside the ICMP Echo-Request block, recompute `hlen`, `space`, and clamp [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`plen`.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the IPv4-proto-[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m dispatch:  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Added the same version/IHL/length checks before setting `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39micmp*[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the Ethernet→IPv4 handler:  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Added IPv4 version/IHL checks, truncated `pkt.raw.len` to `eth_hlen + [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtotal_len`, and adjusted `mkpay` call accordingly.  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Inserted `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_call[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, MG_TCPIP_EV_IP, &pkt.raw[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` before `rx_ip`.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Resulting Log After Patch  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The sanitizing run again reports the same one-byte overflow at `rx_icmp` line [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The allocation size and buffer redzones are unchanged.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The control flow and stack trace remain identical: `mg_tcpip_rx` → `rx_icmp` →[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow on `pkt->icmp->type`.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The initialization and population of `pkt->raw.len` and `pkt->pay.len` in the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz harness and `mg_tcpip_rx` paths.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The logic that invokes `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and how `pkt->pay.buf` & [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->pay.len` are derived.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether there are alternative code paths into `rx_icmp` that bypass the new [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength checks [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., fragmented packet handling or other IP proto handlers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Definitions of `struct pkt`, especially the relationships between `raw.buf`, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pay.buf`, `icmp`, and `ip` pointers.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any other callers of `rx_icmp` or indirect accesses to `pkt->icmp` that might [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot be guarded by the inserted checks.  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The handling of non-standard or deliberately malformed IHL values and total [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlengths that may subvert the bounds validations.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m882[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m883[0m[39m:    pkt.ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m884[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m885[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m886[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:149[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m153[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct pkt *pkt, void *p[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m:  pkt->pay =[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m p, [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m152[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m153[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/str.[0m[1;92mc:8[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m11[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m:struct mg_str [0m[1;35mmg_str_n[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst char *s, size_t n[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m9[0m[39m:  struct mg_str str = [0m[1;39m{[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m s, n[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m10[0m[39m:  return str;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m11[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:795[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m805[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m795[0m[39m:  uint16_t frag = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->frag[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m388[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Refactor `rx_icmp` to perform all header-length and version/IHL validations [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore any dereference of the ICMP header:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. At the top of `rx_icmp`, compute:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - `eth_hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Verify `pkt->raw.len >= eth_hlen + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mensure full IPv4 [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader present[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Extract `struct ip *ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->raw.buf + eth_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Parse `ver = ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`, `ihl = ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m`; require `ver == [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m && [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mihl >= [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m`.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Compute `ip_hlen = ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Require `pkt->raw.len >= eth_hlen + ip_hlen + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Only after these checks, compute:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - `struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Replace every use of `pkt->icmp` in `rx_icmp` with this local `icmp`, e.g.:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp->type != [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m || ip->dst != ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Copy payload from `icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`, guarding by validated lengths.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. This ensures the initial read of `type` is safe.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Harden the IPv4 “protocol [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m” dispatch in `rx_ip`:[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Before setting `pkt->icmp`, repeat the same version/IHL/raw-length checks:[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - `eth_hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Ensure `pkt->raw.len >= eth_hlen + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Extract `ip`, parse `ver`, `ihl`, compute `ip_hlen`[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Ensure `pkt->raw.len >= eth_hlen + ip_hlen + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Compute and assign `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Call `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, which now uses a guaranteed-in-bounds [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Invoke `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Tighten the Ethernet→IPv4 handler under `pkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. After validating minimum IP header and optionally clamping `pkt.raw.len` by [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`total_len`, recompute:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - `ver`, `ihl`, and `ip_hlen = ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Insert a guard:  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < eth_hlen + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      before calling `mkpay`.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Proceed with existing logic to call `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Do not alter external libraries, test or harness code, or other protocol [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandlers. The changes are localized to:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/net_builtin.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `rx_ip`’s IPv4-proto-[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m branch[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ethernet→IPv4 handler in the same file[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Justification:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The heap‐buffer‐overflow arises because the very first dereference of the ICMP[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->icmp->type`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m occurs before any check that ensures the ICMP header [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlies within the allocated packet buffer.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By moving all header‐size checks ahead of that dereference and recalculating [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe ICMP pointer locally, we prevent out‐of‐bounds reads even when the fuzzer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msupplies truncated or malformed IHL values.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Adding similar checks in the IP dispatch and Ethernet frame handler prevents [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mkpay` from being called with invalid pointers, so `pkt->pay` cannot be forged to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpoint outside the original buffer.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This approach preserves existing logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mecho‐request handling, payload [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopying, event callbacks[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m but simply strengthens boundary validation.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No broad exception‐catches or harness modifications are needed; tests and fuzz[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mentry points remain unchanged.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Potential side effects and mitigation:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Packet paths with unusual IHL values or options will now be dropped early; if [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlegitimate IP‐options processing is required, this same guard should be applied [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muniformly to all protocols.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The refactoring uses local `ip` and `icmp` pointers rather than `pkt->icmp` in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp`; ensure no downstream code relies on `pkt->icmp` after `rx_icmp` returns.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Existing IPv4‐options parsing elsewhere already checks for IHL ≥[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m; this patch [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcentralizes that logic in the ICMP and IP dispatch paths for consistency.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. Similar patterns in codebase:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The TCP and UDP handlers in `rx_ip` already validate `pkt->pay.len >= [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` before proceeding; our ICMP fix aligns ICMP handling with these [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafer patterns.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The IPv6 handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip6`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m similarly checks header lengths before [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdereferencing; the ICMP path should mirror that robust design.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNo further file retrieval is needed; all necessary context is in [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/net_builtin.c`. [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
